timeline.message:
datagen

had to delete the cache though for this to generate completly.

timeline.bodyText: Should we keep this? It would make things more consistent as all ores have a tag under forge namespace, but it's also just a copy of the vanilla tag
timeline.author: ichttt

replies.bodyText: I am not sure as well, I just think it is just a tad easier, avoids having to add to a minecraft tag only for gold ore.
replies.author: Cyborgmas

replies.bodyText:
We should keep all of our tags. Having ours extend from vanilla's by default.
It keeps things organized, and it makes things not just dissapear in the middle of a MC version.
We could possibly make it deprecated. But honestly it's a data object it doesn't really matter how long we keep it.
replies.author: LexManos

timeline.bodyText: Same here, it shouldn't just dissapear, if we want to remove it, mark it for removal in 1.16.2.
timeline.author: LexManos

timeline.bodyText: All of these are binary breaks, so no.
timeline.author: LexManos

timeline.message: deprecate tags instead of removing them
fix other derp + remove arrows and musics dics
